text: The 2026–27 ABB FIA Formula E World Championship is the thireenth season of the FIA Formula E championship, a motor racing championship for electrically powered vehicles recognised by motorsport's governing body, the Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA), as the highest class of competition for electric open-wheel racing cars. == Teams and drivers == All teams use the Formula E Gen4 car on Hankook tyres. title: 2026–27 Formula E World Championship
